properties.description: IT services and consulting company specializing in IT/IoT solutions; 280 employees; founded 2005; headquartered in Saudi Arabia; offers SaaS fleet management and IoT solutions with remote, API-integrated access; $5M-$10M revenue; serving the MENA region.
properties.content:
[![Afaqy Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/64aeaf18b0e4652c6f622cf2_afaqy-logo.svg)](https://www.afaqy.com/)

# Integrating Future Technologies

Since 2005

[scroll down](https://www.afaqy.com/#afaqy-section-2)

## Why Choose AFAQY ?

AFAQY is home to some of the latest and most advanced IT and IoT technologies, the provider of a diverse number of solutions, and the partner of a vast list of renowned clients. No matter how big or small your business is, you will find a suitable product, receive the best service, and enjoy the world-class standards AFAQY is famous for.

![Why Afaqy IMG](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/65fc38af1df9fe2e5d25409e_Why-Afaqy-img.webp)

# Achievements

# Achievements

![ministry of hajj](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/65fc339afef1c6f162fabe3e_Official_logo_of_MOH.webp)

## Ministry of Hajj

Installed and controlled 17,000 Tablets in pilgrim transport buses to monitor the attendance of pilgrims and help choose the best route for buses based on the heat map.

![Jeddah Smart Landfill](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/65fc3362e6930593612c74cb_smartlandfill.webp)

## Jeddah Smart Landfill

Installed LPR system to manage the entrance and exit of garbage trucks, weight sensors to extract the weight of trash, developed a waste management module to make sure trucks offload all assigned bins and developed an inspection app to capture violations.

![Saudy Ready Mix](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/65fc3344735eee2e1deb9be9_saudy-ready-mix.webp)

## Saudi Ready Mix

Installed and developed a system to read and report the drums' speed/ direction and send notifications about the process duration and phases such as washing, visited plant site... etc.

![Samsung Knox Tracker](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/65fc33bc2613314fdd114f15_samsong_knox.webp)

## Samsung Knox Tracker

Developed an app that allows business administrators to have full control of enterprise mobile devices through the Samsung Knox framework to be able to control and track business Samsung mobile devices that are handed to site workers, employees, drivers, administrators, inspectors, etc.

![eRental Cars](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/65fc33f2fef1c6f162fb1315_erental.webp)

## eRental Cars

Full control on the cars' engine to start or stop. Developed and installed a smart controlled vehicles system so customers could grant the access to rent a car directly from an app. They can simply book, unlock and drive from anywhere throughout the kingdom

![Ministry of Education](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/65fc3b1f4ff447af65622951_ministryofedu.webp)

## Ministry of Education

Developed school buses management system where the student gets notified with the driver. Student's attendance is granted when he rides the bus and the parent could monitor the students till his safe arrival. The school admin could get detailed reports with driver behavior & punctuality.

# Achievements

![ministry of hajj](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/65fc339afef1c6f162fabe3e_Official_logo_of_MOH.webp)

## Ministry of Hajj

Installed and controlled 17,000 Tablets in pilgrim transport buses to monitor the attendance of pilgrims and help choose the best route for buses based on the heat map.

![Jeddah Smart Landfill](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/65fc3362e6930593612c74cb_smartlandfill.webp)

## Jeddah Smart Landfill

Installed LPR system to manage the entrance and exit of garbage trucks, weight sensors to extract the weight of trash, developed a waste management module to make sure trucks offload all assigned bins and developed an inspection app to capture violations.

![Saudy Ready Mix](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/65fc3344735eee2e1deb9be9_saudy-ready-mix.webp)

## Saudi Ready Mix

Installed and developed a system to read and report the drums' speed/ direction and send notifications about the process duration and phases such as washing, visited plant site... etc.

![Samsung Knox Tracker](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/65fc33bc2613314fdd114f15_samsong_knox.webp)

## Samsung Knox Tracker

Developed an app that allows business administrators to have full control of enterprise mobile devices through the Samsung Knox framework to be able to control and track business Samsung mobile devices that are handed to site workers, employees, drivers, administrators, inspectors, etc.

![eRental Cars](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/65fc33f2fef1c6f162fb1315_erental.webp)

## eRental Cars

Full control on the cars' engine to start or stop. Developed and installed a smart controlled vehicles system so customers could grant the access to rent a car directly from an app. They can simply book, unlock and drive from anywhere throughout the kingdom

![Ministry of Education](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/64934b1b5b168f3686f8521b/64934b1b5b168f3686f85239_push-to-talk.svg)

## Ministry of Education

Developed school buses management system where the student gets notified with the driver. Student's attendance is granted when he rides the bus and the parent could monitor the students till his safe arrival. The school admin could get detailed reports with driver behavior & punctuality.

company.name: AFAQY
company.about:
AFAQY is a leading IT and IoT service provider in Saudi Arabia and the MENA region, serving a large number of reputable clients in different industries. All AFAQY's solutions are dedicated to helping businesses achieve better performance by automating workflows, optimizing internal processes, and enhancing customer experience. We apply state-of-the-art techniques to integrate different types of technologies to develop the best possible solution for your business needs and challenges. 
Since its launch in 2005, AFAQY has partnered with some of the biggest names in the world of information technology and the Internet of Things, earned the trust of local and regional clients, and created some game-challenging solutions.
AFAQY IT is a group of talented engineers, designers, and developers who have been creating remarkable products for years. We have helped many organizations manage their day-to-day processes, expand their businesses, and make more revenue, as we promise to build a game-challenging solution for any business size or industry we deal with. 
From corporations to SMEs and from Telecommunications to Construction, we have a proven track record of overachieving expectations and always staying one step ahead of the competition. 
AFAQY operates from four countries KSA, Egypt, Oman, and Qatar. Our success formula stands on three pillars, value for money, safety without complexity, and sustainability as a perfect balance between people, businesses, and our planet.

evaluations.criterion: Company operates in the SaaS (Software as a Service) industry
evaluations.reasoning: AFAQY's company profile indicates it is an IT services and consulting company offering IT/IoT solutions. The search results show that AFAQY offers fleet management software. The crawled page for fleet management highlights features accessible via phone or tablet, API and telematics integration, suggesting a remotely accessible, provider-managed service. While the term 'SaaS' is not explicitly mentioned, the delivery model aligns with the SaaS definition. Therefore, AFAQY operates in the SaaS industry.
